## deferTasks() function

Defer multiple tasks by a number of days or to a specific date.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function deferTasks(
  taskIds: string[],
  options?: DeferOptions
): Promise<CliOutput<BatchResult<BatchDeferItem>>>;
```
